title: Frog and Mouse
marks:
Signature, Inscription and Marks

BLC: [ ??????? BLC: [ ???????] [Dairy?sai Getsuj? suich?]
text: The small white mouse contrasts starkly with the large frog, while a moral relating the two fills the empty background. The signature reads, 'Dairy'sai Getsuj' while drinking,' suggesting the painting may have been created during a drinking party. Little else is known about the artist.
description: large frog in center and small mouse in LRC; text filling background
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
